participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys a simple life focused on family and music.
participant_1.background: My pet's name is Charlie. I produce music for artists. My favorite food is pizza. I drive a 2015 Honda Civic.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Caring and resourceful, values family and enjoys sewing and crafting in her retirement.
participant_2.background: I'm retired and living the great life. I've amazing children and grandchildren. I had cancer but it's gone now. I can sew my own clothes.

content.text: Nice to see you :hug: howâ€™s everything?

i am in between jobs   how about you
